function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Gap analysis may not capture all pandemic-related sustainability factors, leading to incomplete assessment of building certification systems.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of a complete system to measure building readiness responding to pandemics may result in incomplete or ineffective preparedness for future pandemics.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of disease transmission in built environments due to lack of sustainable practices and certifications","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of residential buildings as multifunctional spaces during pandemics and post-pandemics","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to urban green spaces leading to overcrowding in existing spaces","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate shading and ventilation in urban green spaces","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission risks in densely built urban areas","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of respondents lack a green view from the window, increasing the risk of limited access to natural environments.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Visiting urban parks and green spaces may lead to the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious and infectious diseases spreading through close contact","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased urbanization leading to overcrowding and density in cities","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to green spaces and natural environments","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Manual design/redesign of physical spaces in response to covid-19","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ad-hoc methodology for arranging physical spaces","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of efficient utilization of proposed solution","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assuming a given physical space and constraints based on basic mathematical shapes may not accurately reflect the complexities of a built environment.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stricter social distancing requirements may not be the only constraints to consider in the design of built environments for disease propagation mitigation.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Feasible solutions for seating arrangements may not always be practical due to additional practical considerations such as space for food trolleys.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex geometry with non-convex convoluted structures creates challenges for optimization","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for suboptimal airflow within spaces due to complex geometry and constraints","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to effectively implement social distancing and other physical constraints in the built environment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Imbalanced air distribution due to the positioning of fans and air-conditioners leading to stagnant air pockets.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Optimal arrangement of chairs and tables may not allow for sufficient social distance","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow circulation in the closed environment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Arranging objects in circular or elliptic rooms may create congestion and limit airflow, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate space allocation for social distancing","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective airflow within physical environments","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases in a crowded room with 35 people","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of algorithm not performing optimally in different environments","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ambiguity in optimization problem formulation and implementation details","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Algorithm 1 based on randomly placing circles in a rectangular domain","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Optimization problem for arranging chairs in a rectangular room","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Iterative solving of equations can lead to algorithmic errors and incorrect solutions.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Trust region approximation may introduce inaccuracies in function behavior estimation.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overlap of circles due to inadequate distance constraints","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ineffective optimization of circle placement within the unit square","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of boundary constraints leading to improper circle placement","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overlap of circles leading to potential disease transmission","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of accessibility for movement and flow of people","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overlap of circles in the two-dimensional space, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex mathematical modeling without real-world validation","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for computational efficiency in design arrangements.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease transmission in building design and risks","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proposing a constrained optimization problem for physical space design without considering all relevant factors and
